official_title: Efficacy of 1540 Nanometer Erbium Glass Laser to Improve Benign Dermatofibromas
inclusion_criteria:
* female or male, age 18-65, have at least one dermatofibroma of the skin, on the trunk or extremities, diagnosed by dermatologist, dermatofibroma is either itchy, painful or unattractive to the patient.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 65 Years
exclusion_criteria: * previous treatment to the dermatofibroma(s), pregnant or nursing women, diabetic, smoker, psoriasis, lupus or other autoimmune diseases, patient with a clear history of keloids or poor wound healing. This study will exclude dermatofibroma lesions on the face and genitals.
